original_title: 2022 Girls′ Generation Special Event - Long Lasting Love
overview: 2022 Girls' Generation Special Event "Long Lasting Love" is a fanmeeting held by Girls' Generation. It was held on September 3, 2022 at 7PM KST offline at KSPO Dome and online via Beyond LIVE.
title: 2022 Girls′ Generation Special Event - Long Lasting Love
